alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Grant; La Salle (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 1:45PM CDT until March 30 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... Southeastern Caldwell Parish in north central Louisiana... Eastern La Salle Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 145 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Buckner to 6 miles northwest of Enterprise to near Aimwell to 7 miles south of Midway to 8 miles northeast of Holloway to near Kolin, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jena, Midway, Nebo, Rogers and Catahoula Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Louisiana.
